property.Default value: (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=hostname)(PORT=1521)) where hostname is the network name of the local host.

section:
LOCAL_LISTENER specifies a network name that resolves to an address or address list of Oracle Net local listeners (that is, listeners that run on the same system as this instance). The address or address list is specified in the TNSNAMES.ORA file or other address repository as configured for your system.

See Also:

  • Oracle Database Concepts for more information about listener processes and dispatcher processes

  • Oracle Database Net Services Administrator's Guide and your operating system-specific Oracle documentation for more information about specifying network addresses for the protocols on your system
